message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a rare opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you great value. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $12,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $11,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I'm counteroffering at $10,500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's a great value for the product. What do you think?
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable going above $10,000. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm not willing to go below my minimum price of $10,000. I'm sticking to my guns on this one. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but no lower. What do you think?
